DOC.brief_summary: The study compose two large part , particular large scale prevalence/incidence study single-blind randomise control trial ( RCT ) . The prevalence/incidence study aim determine prevalence/incidence physical , psychological sexual violence pregnant population . The study population recruit prenatal consultation le 15 hospital Belgium . The respondent fill questionnaire spot minimum one time pregnancy . Based questionnaire , investigator aim recruit 150 victim intimate partner violence ( IPV ) participate second part study . The RCT aim evaluate safe effective way reduce IPV within perinatal care set . The investigator hypothesise screen pregnant woman violence combination hand resource card , potential interrupting IPV increase help-seeking behaviour .
DOC.brief_title: Intimate Partner Violence Pregnancy , Perinatal Care Intervention Study
DOC.criteria: Dutch , French English speaking Victim intimate partner violence base questionnaire Accessible telephone safety problem Not Dutch , French English speaking Not victim intimate partner violence one year pregnancy Not accessible telephone and/or safety problem
